verses.kjv: Moreover thou shalt make the tabernacle with ten curtains of fine twined linen, and blue, and purple, and scarlet: with cherubims of cunning work shalt thou make them.
verses.ct: "Build the tabernacle using 10 curtains made from finely woven linen in blue, purple, and scarlet, with cherubim skillfully worked into the design.

verses.kjv: The length of one curtain shall be eight and twenty cubits, and the breadth of one curtain four cubits: and every one of the curtains shall have one measure.
verses.ct: Each curtain must be 42 feet long and 6 feet wide — all 10 curtains should be exactly the same size.

verses.kjv: The five curtains shall be coupled together one to another; and other five curtains shall be coupled one to another.
verses.ct: Join 5 of the curtains together into one set, and join the other 5 into a second set.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make loops of blue upon the edge of the one curtain from the selvedge in the coupling; and likewise shalt thou make in the uttermost edge of another curtain, in the coupling of the second.
verses.ct: Attach loops of blue material along the outer edge of the last curtain in the first set, and do the same along the outer edge of the last curtain in the second set.

verses.kjv: Fifty loops shalt thou make in the one curtain, and fifty loops shalt thou make in the edge of the curtain that is in the coupling of the second; that the loops may take hold one of another.
verses.ct: Put 50 loops on the end curtain of the first set and 50 loops on the end curtain of the second set, positioned so the loops line up directly across from each other.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make fifty taches of gold, and couple the curtains together with the taches: and it shall be one tabernacle.
verses.ct: Then make 50 gold clasps and use them to fasten the two sets of curtains together, so the tabernacle forms one unified structure.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make curtains of goats’ hair to be a covering upon the tabernacle: eleven curtains shalt thou make.
verses.ct: "Also make curtains from goat hair as an outer covering for the tabernacle — 11 curtains in total.

verses.kjv: The length of one curtain shall be thirty cubits, and the breadth of one curtain four cubits: and the eleven curtains shall be all of one measure.
verses.ct: Each of these curtains must be 45 feet long and 6 feet wide — all 11 should be the same size.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt couple five curtains by themselves, and six curtains by themselves, and shalt double the sixth curtain in the forefront of the tabernacle.
verses.ct: Join 5 of the curtains into one set and 6 into another set. Fold the 6th curtain double at the front of the tabernacle.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make fifty loops on the edge of the one curtain that is outmost in the coupling, and fifty loops in the edge of the curtain which coupleth the second.
verses.ct: Attach 50 loops along the outer edge of the last curtain in the first set, and 50 loops along the outer edge of the last curtain in the second set.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make fifty taches of brass, and put the taches into the loops, and couple the tent together, that it may be one.
verses.ct: Make 50 bronze clasps and insert them into the loops to fasten the tent together into one piece.

verses.kjv: And the remnant that remaineth of the curtains of the tent, the half curtain that remaineth, shall hang over the backside of the tabernacle.
verses.ct: The extra half-curtain that remains from the goat-hair covering should hang down over the back of the tabernacle.

verses.kjv: And a cubit on the one side, and a cubit on the other side of that which remaineth in the length of the curtains of the tent, it shall hang over the sides of the tabernacle on this side and on that side, to cover it.
verses.ct: The additional 18 inches on each side from the extra length of these curtains should drape over both sides of the tabernacle to cover it.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make a covering for the tent of rams’ skins dyed red, and a covering above of badgers’ skins.
verses.ct: "Make a covering for the tent from ram skins dyed red, and place over that another covering of fine leather.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make boards for the tabernacle of shittim wood standing up.
verses.ct: "Construct upright frames for the tabernacle from acacia wood.

verses.kjv: Ten cubits shall be the length of a board, and a cubit and a half shall be the breadth of one board.
verses.ct: Each frame must be 15 feet tall and 27 inches wide.

verses.kjv: Two tenons shall there be in one board, set in order one against another: thus shalt thou make for all the boards of the tabernacle.
verses.ct: Each frame should have 2 pegs that fit together in parallel. Make every frame for the tabernacle this way.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make the boards for the tabernacle, twenty boards on the south side southward.
verses.ct: Build 20 frames for the south side of the tabernacle.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make forty sockets of silver under the twenty boards; two sockets under one board for his two tenons, and two sockets under another board for his two tenons.
verses.ct: Make 40 silver bases to go under the 20 frames — 2 bases under each frame, one for each peg.

verses.kjv: And for the second side of the tabernacle on the north side there shall be twenty boards:
verses.ct: For the north side of the tabernacle, also make 20 frames

verses.kjv: And their forty sockets of silver; two sockets under one board, and two sockets under another board.
verses.ct: with their 40 silver bases — 2 bases under each frame.

verses.kjv: And for the sides of the tabernacle westward thou shalt make six boards.
verses.ct: For the west end of the tabernacle, make 6 frames.

verses.kjv: And two boards shalt thou make for the corners of the tabernacle in the two sides.
verses.ct: Also make 2 additional frames for the 2 back corners of the tabernacle.

verses.kjv: And they shall be coupled together beneath, and they shall be coupled together above the head of it unto one ring: thus shall it be for them both; they shall be for the two corners.
verses.ct: These corner frames must be joined together from bottom to top, connected at the top by a single ring. Both corner frames should be constructed this way.

verses.kjv: And they shall be eight boards, and their sockets of silver, sixteen sockets; two sockets under one board, and two sockets under another board.
verses.ct: So there will be 8 frames on the west end with 16 silver bases — 2 bases under each frame.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make bars of shittim wood; five for the boards of the one side of the tabernacle,
verses.ct: "Make crossbars from acacia wood — 5 for the frames on one side of the tabernacle,

verses.kjv: And five bars for the boards of the other side of the tabernacle, and five bars for the boards of the side of the tabernacle, for the two sides westward.
verses.ct: 5 for the frames on the opposite side, and 5 for the frames at the west end.

verses.kjv: And the middle bar in the midst of the boards shall reach from end to end.
verses.ct: The center crossbar should run through the middle of the frames from one end to the other.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt overlay the boards with gold, and make their rings of gold for places for the bars: and thou shalt overlay the bars with gold.
verses.ct: Cover the frames with gold, make gold rings to hold the crossbars, and cover the crossbars with gold as well.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt rear up the tabernacle according to the fashion thereof which was shewed thee in the mount.
verses.ct: Assemble the tabernacle exactly according to the design that was shown to you on the mountain.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make a vail of blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine twined linen of cunning work: with cherubims shall it be made:
verses.ct: "Make a curtain from blue, purple, and scarlet yarn and finely woven linen, with cherubim skillfully worked into it.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt hang it upon four pillars of shittim wood overlaid with gold: their hooks shall be of gold, upon the four sockets of silver.
verses.ct: Hang it on 4 posts of acacia wood covered with gold, fitted with gold hooks, standing on 4 silver bases.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt hang up the vail under the taches, that thou mayest bring in thither within the vail the ark of the testimony: and the vail shall divide unto you between the holy place and the most holy.
verses.ct: Hang this curtain beneath the clasps, and place the ark of the testimony behind it. This curtain will serve as the divider between the holy place and the most holy place.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt put the mercy seat upon the ark of the testimony in the most holy place.
verses.ct: Place the mercy seat on top of the ark of the testimony in the most holy place.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt set the table without the vail, and the candlestick over against the table on the side of the tabernacle toward the south: and thou shalt put the table on the north side.
verses.ct: Position the table outside the curtain on the north side of the tabernacle, and place the lampstand across from it on the south side.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make an hanging for the door of the tent, of blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine twined linen, wrought with needlework.
verses.ct: "For the entrance to the tent, make a screen from blue, purple, and scarlet yarn and finely woven linen, decorated with embroidery.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make for the hanging five pillars of shittim wood, and overlay them with gold, and their hooks shall be of gold: and thou shalt cast five sockets of brass for them.
verses.ct: Make 5 posts of acacia wood for this screen and cover them with gold, with gold hooks. Cast 5 bronze bases for them."
